剚字的基本解释

剚
zì
（用刀）刺：“拔小佩刀欲剚之。”
以物插地。

剚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zì］
［《廣韻》側吏切，去志，莊。］
同“倳1”。“事2”的被通假字。
(1)插。
(2)立。
(3)刺；杀。
(4)引申为割舍。

剚字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剚； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页141第10
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?側吏切，音胾。揷刀也。【管子·輕重篇】春有以剚耕，夏有以剚耘。又【正韻】置也。東方人以物揷地，皆爲剚。又通作倳。【史記·張耳?餘傳】莫敢倳刃公之腹中者。【集韻】或作?，又作?。

剚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
剚字的起名意思

暂无。

erect
Basic explanation of words
erect
zì
(With a knife) stab: "I want to draw a small saber to kill it."
Insert things into the ground.
erect
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zì］
["Guangyun" side officials cut, go to Zhi, Zhuang. ]
Same as "倳1". "Thing 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Insert.
(2) Standing.
(3) Assassinate; kill.
(4) The extension is to give up.
erect
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　剚; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 141-10
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Side staff cut, sound sub. Sword also. [Guanzi·Light and Heavy Chapter] Spring is to plough, and summer is to plough. Also 【Zhengyun】Set also. Orientals smash the land with things. And pass for a bit. [Historical Records · Zhang Er? Yu Chuan] Don't dare to be in the belly of Lord Blade. [Ji Yun] Or for?, and for?.
